PHRASE.LANG: A man only needs two more things. The other one thing to get service, and the second other thing to delve out some…more. [#Legal]
En fait, un homme a besoin d'une chose supplémentaire, qui sert elle aussi à se couvrir. [#Legal]
Ein Mann braucht nur noch zwei weitere Dinge. Das eine, um Respekt zu bekommen, das andere, um ... noch mehr Respekt zu lehren. [#Legal]
Ai veri uomini servono solo altre due cose: anche in questo caso, qualcosa va coperto… [#Legal]
Un hombre solo necesita dos cosas más. Una para que lo atiendan; la otra, para llamar la atención... más. [#Legal]
ジーンズもあると便利 [#Legal]
남자는 두 가지가 더 필요하다. 바지도 입어야 술집에 들어갈 수 있고, 다른 하나는… [#Legal]
A man only needs two more things. The other one thing to get service, and the second other thing to delve out some…more. [#Legal]
男子漢只需要兩種東西，一件襯衫和一把槍。一是找服務，二是探究其他…… [#Legal]
男子漢只需要兩種東西，一件襯衫和一把槍。一是找服務，二是探究其他…… [#Legal]
A man only needs two more things. The other one thing to get service, and the second other thing to delve out some…more. [#Legal]
